front.title: Segmented MVPN Using IP Lookup for BIER

abstract.t: This document specifies an alternative of the control plane and data plane procedures that allow segmented MVPN using BIER. This allows the use of a more efficient explicit-tracking as the BIER overlay, with a slight change in the forwarding procedure of a segmentation point BFR by a lookup of the IP header. This document updates [I- D.ietf-bier-mvpn].
